home.title: Welcome to Boardify!
home.description: Boardify is your infinite digital board for organizing media — ideal for moodboards, research collections, and visual planning. Built with React and Tauri for speed and flexibility.

items.title: Infinite Canvas
items.description: Arrange media and notes freely in a boundless space. Perfect for creative brainstorming and visual workflows.

items.title: Drag & Drop
items.description: Quickly upload and organize images, videos, and documents using intuitive drag-and-drop gestures.

items.title: Plugin-Ready
items.description: Designed to be extended — easily integrate new tools or build custom functionality.

items.title: Tauri-Powered
items.description: Fast, lightweight, and native-feeling performance through Tauri — ideal for power users.

items.title: Custom UI
items.description: Built with React and MUI. You can restyle and reshape the interface to match your workflow.

items.title: Support for additional file types
items.description: Add support for PDF, audio, and docs.

items.title: Media search and tagging system
items.description: Implement search and tagging for media files.

items.title: Plugin API for custom extensions
items.description: Enable third-party plugins to extend functionality.

items.title: Markdown note support for contextual boards
items.description: Support for markdown syntax in notes.
